title: (Fri Early Bird) Bobby Has A Question About Daycare to the Parents on the Show + Mailbag: Is This Listener an Accomplice in a Crime? + Easy Trivia
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Bobby Has A Question About Daycare to the Parents on the Show + Mailbag: Is This Listener an Accomplice in a Crime? + Easy Trivia
description:
Bobby has a question about a contract for a daycare…so he inquires with the parents in the room. In the mailbag, a listener has a question about seeing two teenagers steal food from a restaurant. What should they have done? And we play our Friday round of Easy Trivia!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
